DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this observational study is to investigate the efficacy (e.g. glycemic control) and safety (e.g. hypoglycemic episodes) when adding repaglinide to a monotherapy of metformin in type 2 diabetic patients under normal clinical practice
DOC.brief_title: Switch From Metformin Monotherapy to a Bitherapy With Metformin and Repaglinide
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Metformin monotreatment HbA1c greater than 7% Treatment according to SPC Informed consent obtained Any contraindication to the use of repaglinide (according to the SPC)
